column5: I have seen some fishing pictures from this area a couple of years ago when the group was fishing in a burnt out area and I mean burnt out not a single tree for miles just blackened stumps and trees with the odd bit of green grass. It sure looked strange with a guy holding a beautiful lake trout in his canoe with the blackened moonlike landscape behind him. I guess we can consider ourselves lucky that Algonquin has not suffered this fate in a very,very long time but i'm sure her day will come, just hope it's not in our life time !

I like woods and water, never been to that area but I have seen pictures and it is beautiful, hate to see it getting burnt. Have you seen the pics of the fires in Texas? I can`t imagine living in a place that is so dry.
